translation: Qasm chhu anjyruk ya anjyr kuliyuk byyhi chhu qasm zytvnuk ya zytvn kuliyuk, (yim doshve chhi babrkt myvh thi kulụ̄ thi, ya chhu murad tamhi jayhi hund th tamhi shhruk qasm yythi anjyr kulụ̄ th zytvn kulụ̄ bkthrt pạdh chhi spdan. Aakh jae gyhi yath kun abrahym ʿlyh alslamn hjrt krmcz chhe, byakh jae gyhi yythi ʿīsyā rvḥ Allah tvld spudmut chhu.)
Byyhi chhu kvhi ṭvruk qasm yath petth mvsyā ʿlyh alslam Allah tʿālyā hs sintụ̄ hm klam spud.)
Byyhi chhu qasm yymhi amn kh shhruk, (yath shhrs mnz kʿbtuh Allah vaqʿ chhu byyhi yus shhr ḥẓrt almrslyn sndi vladti basʿādtuk shhr chhu. Yime czvr qsm hạvith chhu frmavan Allah tʿālyā.)
Be shk pạdh kvr aashi ansan rtis andazs andr bhtryn shkl v ṣvrt kvrus ʿṭa.
Tamhi pth vvl suh aashi bvnimhi drjhi kyv lvukv andrh thi zyadh bon (nafrmạny th kfr v shrkh sbbh).

Mgr yimv lvukv ayman avn th byyhi krykh rczh ʿmlh tihindi khạṭrh chhu suh thvab yus nh zanhh thi khtm gczihh. (yylhi Allah tʿālyā pạdh krns petth byyhi aḥval bdlavns petth pvurh qdrt vvl chhu. Ae ansanh.)
Adh kus chyz chhue cze tkdhyb th ankar krnavan jzakis dohs?
Kya Allah tʿālyā chhuna ḥạkmn hund bvdd ḥạkm? (yas tṣruf chhu dnyakyn sarine aamvurn petth th ạkhrt kyn sarine amvurn petth thi.)
